data.text:
Came with my husband for a business trip.
Nice hotel, nice room. Cleaners always did an amazing job. All the staff here were very friendly and helpful. Thank you to all the staff that worked at the pool area in particular. Ram, Sarif and especially to Mervin. Ye are amazing
data.title: Amazing Staff

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you so much for taking the time to review us. We are delighted to know that you enjoyed the experience in the hotel. 
We will also convey your constructive feedback to the management, and we hope you will give us a chance to serve you again. 

Warm Regards,

Joseph Feghali
Rooms Division Manager
owner_response.author: Joseph Feghali

data.text: Hotel was great for what we wanted - location, quiet, facilities and quality of the staff. We were recognised straight away as Platinum elite members of the IHG Rewards Group and were given first class treatment throughout our 4 night stay by all the staff. We were particularly impressed by Jolor in the Club Lounge who was excellent at her job.
data.title: Excellent stay with first class staff experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for the excellent rating & feedback about your most recent visit at Crowne Plaza Dubai Jumeirah. We are so glad to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. 
We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future, where we can have the opportunity to showcase our True Hospitality once again. 

Warm regards, 

Joseph Feghali
Rooms Division Manager
owner_response.author: Joseph Feghali

data.text: A shiny high-end hotel with an impressive reception area leading in to the excellent buffet restaurant I used from breakfast (no jam but had everything and more you would want), and a lovely bar option too with scrummy food. I didn’t use the Asian restaurant but that looked equally as impressive. The rooms are big and spacious with a nice big bath (reaching soap a little awkward from the bath). The swimming pool area is part of a health club and is very pleasant with plenty of sunbeds and an attentive bar staff. Attractions best reached  by cheap taxi/Uber which works well. This hotel is highly recommended and has lovely staff throughout.
data.title: Cracking hotel

The great service from Front Joseph Feghali he was the best in communication…
anything please asked joseph Feghali .
Big thanks to Sathik he picked me up from airport to safari nice people very helpful…
Thanks T he Thanks to housekeeping team keeps my makeup my room and clean every day.. Thnks Nalid Big thanks you are the best..
Breakfast team is allso good team .. clean hotels . 
Thanks
data.title: great place to stay …

data.text:
Excellent Service, wonderful location. Airport pickup service was on time and perfect. Thanks to the concierge driver Mr. Hashim. 

Hotel was super clean and super comfortable. Your staff is truly amazing and I would recommend everyone to stay here.
data.title: Excellent stay and service at Crowne Plaza Dubai
